summary: Website project with editable content (e.g., About Us/Bylaws, gallery) and a need for a way to upload images and manage Notices and Events without direct admin dashboard access.
architectural_notes: Users without the original creator identity cannot access the admin dashboard; site updates/content management may need an alternative workflow or delegated admin access.
known_issues: User receives 'Access Denied' when trying to access the admin dashboard with their Internet Identity principal (not an admin identity).

existing_features.title: Add an image file upload option in the Admin Dashboard Gallery management UI so admins can choose a local image file and have it saved as the gallery item image (store the image in the existing `imageUrl` field using a Data URL string, with basic client-side validation and clear English error messages).

new_feature_requests.summary: Provide a way to upload/manage images for the site (e.g., gallery)
Add/update a Notices section with ability to post and manage notices
Add/update an Events section with ability to post and manage events

Grant admin permissions to the Internet Identity Principal `bivov-zoivv-elizs-vxwob-drkj7-3idkg-ay4cf-tugyq-vy2rd-oretd-vae` so this user can access the existing Admin Dashboard and manage Notices, Events, and Gallery items.

projectName: Grant admin access to provided Principal and add gallery image upload for Notices/Events management
